page.name: Evaluation: Quiz
page.intro: Directions for setting up a Quiz to evaluate learners.
page.content:
The Evaluation stage of your WIPPEA lesson may be accomplished through the Quiz activity in Moodle. Formative assessment types of questions like short answer, multiple choice, matching, true/false questions can all be set up to provide immediate feedback to students and allow them to re-attempt responses if appropriate.

They can be time-consuming to set up because they require the questions to be created individually, but the time they save you by providing immediate feedback is a valuable trade-off.

Since essay questions require manual grading, those types of questions might be better left for the Assignment module.

Quiz module documentation: http://docs.moodle.org/en/Quiz_module
